title: I thought if my premade gets an S, I get a Hextech Chest but I didn't.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Okay so the thing is my profile says I have 1 chest available so I figured I'd play with my premades since if they got an S I get a chest, however one of them got the S and I was playing Pantheon who I didn't get a chest with, I still didn't get the chest. What am I missing here? I posted the match history of the game, he was the Graves. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I wasn't able to load up this match to get more details.  What champion were you playing for this game?  Have you already received a chest with the champion before?  Was the premade a party of friends you queued together with?  Per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, these are a few requirements to make you eligible for the mastery chest.  Let me know!
